ygData.subject: RE: Specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: It s in the Temple of Solusek Ro: Respecialize: Talk to Ostorm and he will offer to change your specialization if you give him a ruby and 50 gp. This resets
ygData.messageBody:
It's in the Temple of Solusek Ro:

Respecialize: Talk to Ostorm and he will offer to change your specialization
if you give him a ruby and 50 gp. This resets all of your specializations
back to 49. Make sure the one that hits 50 next is the one you realy want.


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Martin Pikas [SMTP:martin.pikas@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 16, 1999 5:03 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Specialization
>
> From: "Martin Pikas" <martin.pikas@...>
>
> Just a short note for those of you that are afraid of getting the "wrong"
> specialization above 51.
>
> There is a way of resetting them. I do not remember exactly how. But it is
> something with a tiny NPC in Cazic Thule I think. And it costs something
> like an expensive gem. I have heard it truncates them all to 49. Not sure
> of
> the details. Should be pretty common knowledge though.
>
> (This has been a big discussion amongst Magicians. Turned out to be
> Evocation up to lvl 45 then Conjuration.)
>
> Renden, Enchanter (on Tunare)
> Also Zaltil, Magician (on Innoruuk)
>
>
